response.job_title: Research, Development and Innovation | Project Manager of Product Development | Chemical Engineer | Specialized in Beverages, Foods and Home Care Products
response.summary: Chemical Engineer with seven years of experience leading Research, Innovation and Development Projects for Mass Consumption products for the markets of Colombia, the Dominican Republic and Haiti. Responsible for managing and guaranteeing the timely launch of new products and the optimization of existing products, developing the product´s formula, packaging, and production process. Professional with a high level of knowledge in product and process design and development, as well as an outstanding ability to manage projects and lead multidisciplinary teams.
response.skills: Capacidad de análisis, Procesos industriales, Microsoft Office, Planificación de proyectos, Industria de bebidas, Liderazgo, Desarrollo de productos, Responsabilidad, Productos de consumo, Investigación y desarrollo , Ingeniería química, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería, Empresas

profile_positions.description: • Launched Vive 100% Blueberry in the Dominican Republic.
profile_positions.title: Master Research, Development and Innovation Engineer - RTD Beverages Category

profile_positions.description:
• Led and developed new packaging formats in the energy beverages category with the brand "Vive 100%" for the Dominican Republic.
• Led improvements in the Seasoning category with the brand "Ricompleto" for the Dominican Republic, through reformulation projects, homologation of raw materials, and packaging initiatives.
• Developed a new shrimp broth formula for Haitian market.
profile_positions.title: Senior Research, Development and Innovation Engineer - Foods and RTD Beverages Category

profile_positions.description:
• I received Quala's Innovation Award for the development of “Kupet Dwet” broth for the Haitian market. 
• Led product development (formula and packaging) and managed the projects to launch the brands of broths "Manita", "El Criollito tomato tablet" and "El Criollito Tomate Cubo" for Haiti.
profile_positions.title: Research, Development and Innovation Engineer - Foods Category

profile_positions.description:
• Led the product and manufacturing process development of a new category in the company, Gel Bleach “Brilla King” brand, designed for the hard discount D1 supermarkets in Colombia. 
• Developed the formulas and managed the project launch of four varieties of floor cleaners "Brilla King" brand for the hard discount D1 supermarkets in Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Senior Research and Development Analyst - Home Care Category
Research and Development Assistant - Home Care Category

profile_positions.description: • Developed the formula of "Cristales de Sal con Mix de Pimientas Refisal", initially planned as an In&Out product and later established as a line product due to its high consumer acceptance.
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Intern - Foods Category

company.name: Quala
company.description: Somos una compañía de alcance multilatino con marcas que sorprenden a más de 300 millones de consumidores en Latinoamérica, a través de 10 compañías que llevan los productos Quala a cada mercado con más de 10 mil colaboradores.

location.raw: Santo Domingo, Distrito Nacional, Dominican Republic
